Jack::JackThreadedDriver Class Reference

The base class for threaded drivers using a "decorator" pattern. Threaded drivers are used with blocking devices. More...

#include <JackThreadedDriver.h>

Detailed Description

The base class for threaded drivers using a "decorator" pattern. Threaded drivers are used with blocking devices.
